The daily global solar exposure is the total solar energy for a day falling on a horizontal surface. It is measured from midnight to midnight. The values are usually highest in clear sun conditions during the summer and lowest during winter or very cloudy days. Will the daily global solar exposure at Rosslyn Park (Seaview) weather station in Australia exceed [number] MJm-2 on [date]?

The Storm Prediction Center updates preliminary observations of tornadoes, hails, and winds in the USA every Saturday. Will the total number of Tornadoes, Hails, and Winds exceed [number] for the [month]?

The Philippine Atmospheric, Geophysical and Astronomical Services Administration (PAGASA) monitors floods in Metro Manila. PAGASA classifies flood warnings into 4 categories in increasing levels of urgency - normal, alert, alarm and critical.There are multiple stations throughout Metro Manila to track water levels and issue flood warnings if necessary.On [date], will there be at least one station whose flood warning is at a critical level?

Will the local interest in the search term 'electric vehicles' remain above 50 between 0900 to 1700 hours on [date]?  (N.B. The numbers on “Google Trends” represent search interest relative to the highest point on the chart for a given region and time. A value of 100 reflects the peak popularity for a term. A value of 50 means that the term is half as popular. A score of 0 means there was not enough data for this term.)
